Hi, I just wonder how the layer_norm finally goes? As for now (Jan 2018) I think the layer_norm is still using the batch_norm as the backbone. And for my model training of a small mini-batch size, layer_norm is almost 2x slower than batch normalization, any luck that we can make it faster?

Thanks!

body:
Hi, I just wonder how the layer_norm finally goes? As for now (Jan 2018) I think the layer_norm is still using the batch_norm as the backbone. And for my model training of a small mini-batch size, layer_norm is almost 2x slower than batch normalization, any luck that we can make it faster?
